title: Made by Originals - What a font is it?
content:
I spend now weeks, to find out what font they used for their campaigne - Maybe someone of you guys can help me whith that -

Im looking for the name of 2 different fonts:  
01. Made by Originals - What kind of font is that?  
02. Dingbats & KIngs Garden - What kind of font is it?

The image i attached to this comment.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090528111350im_/http:/typophile.com/files/find_4632.jpg)
author: leoschenk

comments.content: 02 looks like Adobe Caslon Italic with swash caps.
The second one it could be and the first one? The first one, i think its a different type - what do you think?
What do you think, who could me help with it??

As I said in the other topic, looks like a customized version of Times/Times New Roman.

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel
